alert.note: Alert for Martin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 8:14PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MARTIN...FLOYD...KNOTT...AND JOHNSON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 814 PM EST, a snow squall was over Arkansas, or 7 miles south of Prestonsburg moving south at 15 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Alphoretta around 820 PM EST. Honaker and Aluba around 825 PM EST. Printer, Langley, Blue Moon and Hueysville around 830 PM EST. Hunter, Eastern and Grethel around 835 PM EST. Bosco around 840 PM EST. Minnie and Drift around 845 PM EST. McDowell, Porter Junction, East McDowell, Garret and Craynor around 850 PM EST. Estill, Wayland, Glo, Orkney and Betty around 855 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
